# üçê PearMusic

# Welcome to Pear Music! 
Pear Music is an Apple Music inspired full-stack application that includes features that allow users to stream/upload their favorite music! 

## Home Page
![Alt Text](https://media.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExZDYwN2QxZjc2YWUzMGYzMjU3ZDhmZWFhMmEyMWI0NTQwYTE3ODU4ZiZjdD1n/VqloZHGYsSGD9UPXyM/giphy.gif)
